_id.description: MongoDB ObjectId - unique identifier for the career agent relationship (transformed to relationshipId in API responses)

careerAgentId.description: User ID of the career agent

candidateId.description: User ID of the candidate (can have multiple relationships but only one active)

relationshipStatus.description: Current status of the career agent relationship

startDate.description: When the career agent relationship started (defaults to current date)

endDate.description: When the career agent relationship ended (null if still active)

message.description: Additional message about the career agent relationship

createdAt.description: When the relationship was created (automatically set by timestamps)

updatedAt.description: When the relationship was last updated (automatically set by timestamps)

careerAgent.description: Virtual field - populated career agent user profile details

candidate.description: Virtual field - populated candidate user profile details
